pages.title: Kamen Rider Killbus
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Build NEW WORLD: Kamen Rider Cross-Z (2019, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:build/devices/build_driver_killbus)Build Driver (Killbus)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance II$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength IV
